meanings.definition: Decorative edging on fabric, typically in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent1: The pinkings on the dress added a fun touch to the outfit.
meanings.sent2: She carefully sewed pinkings along the hem of the skirt.
meanings.sent3: The pinkings on the curtains made them look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed as she added pinkings to the plain fabric.
meanings.sent5: The pinkings stood out, making the fabric more interesting.

meanings.definition: The act of creating decorative edging on fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her pinkings of the tablecloth were precise and neat.
meanings.sent2: Pinkings require patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her pinkings were so perfect, they could win an award.
meanings.sent4: The pinkings she made were like little smiles on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: With each pinkings she added, the fabric transformed beautifully.

meanings.definition: The result of creating decorative edging on fabric.
meanings.sent1: The pinkings gave the dress a charming finish.
meanings.sent2: After hours of work, the pinkings were finally complete.
meanings.sent3: The pinkings looked like tiny waves on the fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication showed in the intricate pinkings she made.
meanings.sent5: The pinkings enhanced the fabric, making it more appealing.
